biotools.summary: Web server for simulating protein-ligand unbinding. It computes the ligand exit path from the active site to the protein surface using robotics-inspired algorithms. The PDB file provided as input may contain several ligands.

bioschemas.name: MoMA-LigPath
bioschemas.summary: Web server for simulating protein-ligand unbinding. It computes the ligand exit path from the active site to the protein surface using robotics-inspired algorithms. The PDB file provided as input may contain several ligands.
